title: Copenhagen Sustainable Retreat near Denmark's Largest Shopping Mall
description: A pioneer in Danish sustainability without sacrificing style or comfort, Crowne Plaza Copenhagen Towers, an IHG Hotel, is minutes from the city centre and the airport. Savour locally-sourced Nordic cuisine in true American diner fashion at BARK restaurant. Then, splurge on some retail therapy at Field's, Denmark's largest shopping mall, less than a five-minute walk from the hotel, or head out to soak up the picturesque architecture and canals of this modern Scandinavian city.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Copenhagen Towers, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Copenhagen Towers, Orestads Blvd. 114-118, 2300 Copenhagen, Denmark

title: Five-Star Copenhagen Stay Near Rosenborg Castle with Rooftop Garden Bar
description:
Uncover the culture and history of Copenhagen from your stylish base, the five-star Hotel Skt. Petri - perfectly positioned just a short stroll from some of the city's best sights including the Round Tower, Tivoli Gardens and Rosenborg Castle. Built within a former department store, this trendy property combines Danish stylings with modern amenities and features ultra-cool rooms or suites, an impressive restaurant and cocktail bar, a modern fitness centre, New York-inspired rooftop beer garden and onsite bicycle hire so you can roll through the history-lined streets.

Located with one foot in the trendy Latin Quarter and the other within the historic-filled part of Copenhagen, Skt. Petri is the ultimate launchpad for discovering the Danish capital. Visit The Little Mermaid statue, marvel at the coloured buildings in Nyhavn or catch a train at the nearby NÃ¸rreport Station for a day trip beyond the city limits.
